Hoboken.The Shed (Hudson Yards): The Shed (formerly known as Culture Shed and Hudson Yards Cultural Shed) is the name of an independent non-profit cultural organization, as well as its eponymous six-story building under development on the far west side of Manhattan, being built within the Hudson Yards Redevelopment Project, adjacent to the northern leg of the High Line and in the Chelsea gallery district. Scheduled to open in 2019, the Shed will host activities in a wide range of cultural areas. Construction began in mid-2015.
